CORE_CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x84c
Size:
0x4
Source:
regs.rdl

Description

Core control register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:2] reserved rw 0x0 -
[1] LOAD_IN rw 0x0 -
[0] RESET rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

reserved

Unused

LOAD_IN

A pulse on this register loads the neural network with the input data from the INPUT_GRID_* flops

RESET

When 1'b1, reset the status registers, so that a new input can be loaded in
